channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SC

item.title: Report I-2023120040
item.description:
Report I-2023120040

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-24T00:37:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-13
  • City: CLINTON
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PENN TANK LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 155000
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Vehicle left the right side of the roadway and overturned. Local fire rescue and police responded initially and cleanup was conducted by HEPACO.
